name: Corners (itch) (SSibai)
description:
Inspired by the Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds; Corners is a puzzle game that uses dimension switch as a mechanic, turning Blinky into a painting. But unlike the Zelda game, Blinky can only move in 2D as a painting.

Space: Dimension Switch.

Moving front and right: right arrow.

Moving back and left: left arrow.

Developed by: Salam Sibai
